name: Gift Card
description:
Piecemaker Studio has made gift giving super easy! It's a perfect shower gift, or ideal for those who can't decide which one to give. Choose your own denomination by contacting Piecemaker Studio if you do not see your preference in the drop down menu.

Available in two formats

1) Sent by E-MAIL
to recipient in any denomination

2) Sent by MAIL
to you, or person of choice
Includes a greeting card (blank inside) with gift card attached, white envelope, and a sample postcard that shows exactly the type of pieces your recipient can choose from (handy when you do not have immediate access to the internet).
Note: custom messages can be written inside the card for you if direct delivery to recipient is chosen.

Please contact info@piecemakerstudio.com or
click here if you would like to
select a custom denomination for your gift card.

**Shipping is complimentary with gift cards $65.00 or more**

ORDERING PROCESS Please include the following in "Note to seller" section when checking out (on the PayPal page) 1) Delivery choice E-MAIL or MAIL 2) RECIPIENT FULL NAME 3) EMAIL ADDRESS or MAILING ADDRESS if sending directly to your recipient Once your order is confirmed, your gift card will be sent as soon as possible. (Please double check your spam folder if you have not heard back within 24hrs)

name: Icons Personalized Keepsake
description:
Two words: “Mommy-Brain.” This canvas really helps to remind me of the details of my son’s birth. It sits above Marcus’ change pad – He loves to point and say the letters and numbers that he recognizes while I change his diaper.
Available in different sizes, formats, and prices.
Canvas Prints This artwork is specially printed on high quality cotton canvas, rather than paper, and is suitable for framing (frame not included). Because of the material, it can be kept as a beautiful keepsake. Available in the following sizes:   10" x 8" print    $20.00 14" x 11" print    $25.00 20" x 16" print    $35.00 *Landscape and Portrait versions available Click here for a few samples. Gallery Wrapped Canvas Printed on high quality cotton canvas, this artwork is gallery wrapped around an anti-warping wooden frame (therefor no additional framing is required). It comes ready to hang with mounting brackets and screws. They are lightweight, and because there is no breakable glass, it is the perfect accent for any child’s bedroom. Available in the following sizes:   10" x 8" gallery wrapped    $35.00 14" x 11" gallery wrapped    $50.00 20" x 16" gallery wrapped    $65.00 *Landscape and Portrait versions available

ORDERING PROCESS 1. Purchase this item. After receiving your order, a form will be sent via email requesting your information for customization. 2. A digital proof will be sent to you for approval of printing within 24hrs of receiving your completed form. (Please double check your spam folder if you have not heard back within 24hrs)
